title: Writing, plain and fancy
creator_credit: Severo Perez, Mallory Pearce and Walt Disney Animation Studios
brief_description: Surveys the evolution of written communication. Beginning with the Romans and their invention of capital letters, the program continues through the reign of the great King Charlemagne who standardized the alphabet. The importance of legible writing for good communication is stressed. Narrated by John Houseman.
